other_tests.findings: Mild apical displacement of the tricuspid valve, moderate tricuspid valve insufficiency, right heart enlargement, atrial septal defect, membranous VSD, and LVNC.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 3 years of follow-up, the patient continues to have echocardiographic features of LVNC with abnormal myocardial relaxation.

other_tests.changes_over_time: He is now aged 1 year and in good health. His cardiac function has steadily improved to reach a left ventricular ejection fraction of approximately 60%, but he continues to have echocardiographic features of LVNC with abnormal myocardial relaxation.

other_tests.findings: Hypertrophied right ventricle and secondary tricuspid regurgitation with a systolic gradient of 100 mm Hg.
